refnamediv.refpurpose: Abstract base classe for production readout scaler triggers.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: For versions 8.4-pre5 and later of the production readout framework, arbitrary triggers can be used to induce scaler buffer reads. This is done by registering a Scaler Trigger object with the CExperiment object.

CScalerTrigger is the abstract base class of the hierarchy of possible scaler trigger objects. It defines the interfaces required of scaler trigger objects and, where possible, provides default implementations.

refsect1.title: METHODS
refsect1.para: This function must be provided by concrete scaler triggers. If a concrete scaler trigger is registered with the CExperiment object as the scaler trigger, this member is periodically polled. It should return true if the scalers should be read and false if not.
This function is called whenever the run transitions to active. This may be either when the run first begins or when a paused run is resumed. Default implementation is to do nothing.
This function is called whenever the run goes inactive. This can be either due to the end of run or pausing a run. The default implementation is to do nothing.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
